name: Squirrel
help: Squirrel is both a set of tools and a library, to completely manage both installation and updating your Desktop Windows application, written in either C# or any other language (i.e., Squirrel can manage native C++ applications).

properties.name: Install
properties.help: Install the app whose package is in the specified directory.

properties.name: Uninstall
properties.help: Uninstall the app the same dir as Update.exe.

properties.name: Download
properties.help: Download the releases specified by the URL and write new results to stdout as JSON.

properties.name: CheckForUpdate
properties.help: Check for one available update and writes new results to stdout as JSON.

properties.name: Update
properties.help: Update the application to the latest remote version specified by URL.

properties.name: Releasify
properties.help: Update or generate a releases directory with a given NuGet package.

properties.name: CreateShortcut
properties.help: Create a shortcut for the given executable name.

properties.name: RemoveShortcut
properties.help: Remove a shortcut for the given executable name.

properties.name: UpdateSelf
properties.help: Copy the currently executing Update.exe into the default location.

properties.name: ProcessStart
properties.help: Start an executable in the latest version of the app package.

properties.name: ProcessStartAndWait
properties.help: Start an executable in the latest version of the app package.

properties.name: ReleaseDirectory
properties.help: Path to a release directory to use with releasify.

properties.name: PackagesDirectory
properties.help: Path to the NuGet Packages directory for C# apps.

properties.name: BootstrapperExecutable
properties.help: Path to the Setup.exe to use as a template.

properties.name: LoadingGif
properties.help: Path to an animated GIF to be displayed during installation.

properties.name: Icon
properties.help: Path to an ICO file that will be used for icon shortcuts.

properties.name: SetupIcon
properties.help: Path to an ICO file that will be used for the Setup executable's icon.

properties.name: SignWithParameters
properties.help: Sign the installer via SignTool.exe with the parameters given.

properties.name: BaseUrl
properties.help: Provides a base URL to prefix the RELEASES file packages with.

properties.name: ProcessStartArguments
properties.help: Arguments that will be used when starting executable.

properties.name: ShortcutLocations
properties.help: Comma-separated string of shortcut locations, e.g. 'Desktop,StartMenu'.

properties.name: GenerateNoMsi
properties.help: Don't generate an MSI package.

properties.name: GenerateNoDelta
properties.help: Don't generate delta packages to save time

properties.name: FrameworkVersion
properties.help: Set the required .NET framework version, e.g. net461
